(meyage poto gahanna harima amaruyi.....asa piyawanawa hamawelema ..) .......methana andanna salon thiyana aya awith hitiya...adinna nirupikawan awith hitiya....ane ithin apita kohida chans.....eetath wada mis.....ee kiyanne me patamalawa karapu kena eka akka kenekta mara widiyata help kala....eyage kostiyums thama anduwe ee akkage brayidslata.....ethakota kandiyan brayidsla dennek anduwa ee juwelaris serama dala....eewath ee misge...pita ayata udawu karanna thahanamne tharagayak nisa...namuth ee mis ee akkage brayidslagen ekkenekge heyarstayil eka sampurnayenma danma....ekkenekwa mekap kala....ape thaththata yaka nagala hitiye....eth randuwak athikaranna hoda nathi nisa nikam hitiya....oppu karanna sakshith epayi...mage kamaraman mage hodama yaluwa...nama salo..........api hodama yaluwo.....man japure inna kale eya man ugannana skul eke grafik patamalawak kala.ethanadi eyata fotograpi kos ekak karanna puluwan una...ithin eya thama mage fotograpar........thaththa kiwa eyata mis andana poto ekak ganna kiyala...api ganna hadanakotama miswa kawar karagaththa ee kattiya...mona karannada...adu gane api laga kamara fon ekakwath thibune nane.....:( .......
